Hi DeGun,

After installing the most recent updates from microsoft on windows 7 64-bit which were release on 5/15/2013 this loader is no longer working. When I try running this loader is says status:modified-uninstall other cracks. I followed the directions and tried running WAT fix and restarted. After restart, I tried running the loader and I installed and restarted. The counterfeit error message came back at the desktop. I then tried running remove WAT 2.2 which took away the desktop message and pop-up saying it was counterfeited and that's where I'm at. Could this be due to M$ finding a fix for Windows Loader in the most recent updates? Maybe windows loaders needs an updated version? Thanks
